SEARCH

Class CampInformation

java.lang.Object
CampInformation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visibility
Direct Known Subclasses:
Camp
public abstract class CampInformation extends Object implements Visibility
The CampInformation stores the necessary attributes for the camp in this camp management system, such as ID, name, dates, registration deadline, locaiton, etc. It realizes the visibility class to provide a method to hide or unhide the camp to the student. The visibility is meant to be controlled by the staff.

  • Constructor Details

    • CampInformation

      public CampInformation(int campID, String campName, ArrayList<Date> campDates, Date registrationDeadline, String facultyOpenTo, String location, int totalSlots, int campCommitteeSlots, String description, String staffID, boolean isVisible)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp.
      campName - The name of the camp.
      campDates - The dates that the camp will be held.
      registrationDeadline - The date of registration deadline.
      facultyOpenTo - The faculty from which the students are allowed to register and attend.
      location - The location of the camp.
      totalSlots - The number of maximum slots for committee and attendees combined.
      campCommitteeSlots - The maximum number of slots reserved for camp committees.
      description - The description of the camp.
      staffID - The ID of staff that create this camp.
      isVisible - A boolean indicating whether the camp is visible to student.

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible(String faculty)
      Returns whether the camp is visible to student from a specific faculty.
      Parameters:
      faculty - The faculty to check. "*" indicates that the camp is visible to all faculties.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the camp is visible to the student from the input faculty.

      Changes the name of the camp. This method is to be performed by staff.

    • setFacultyOpenTo

      public void setFacultyOpenTo(String facultyOpenTo) throws CampException
      Changes the faculty that the camp open to. "*" indicates the camp is open to all faculty. This method is to be performed by staff.
      Parameters:
      facultyOpenTo - The new allowed faculty from which student can register and attend the camp.
      Throws:
      CampException - If the faculty that the camp opens to cannot be modified.

      The abstract method to set the new attendees slot of the camp.
      Parameters:
      newSlots - The number of total slot to change to
      Throws:
      CampException - If the change is unsuccesful.
